gol.Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gol.Controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    What can be improved with the Controller? - The program currently only has one Controller and it would be better to split it into several Controllers For instance, MenuController, CanvasController, Master Controller. Didn't get time to do this.

      Runs nextgeneration in the timeline Timeline jumps to start to the duration ZERO Duration is set to 200 millis This means nextgeneration will happend every 200 milliseconds

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void about()
      About the game
      void changeDyn()
      - Radiobutton to Dynamic When Radiobutton DynamicBoard is selected the interface refers to the DynamicBoard class After the object is created, the initMethods are called.
      void changeStat()
      - Radiobutton to Static When Radiobutton static is selected the interface refers to the StaticBoard class When the dynamicBoard is used and changed to Static StaticBoard, it remembers the board converts it to byte and sets the static board This won't delete the pattern and the user can use the same pattern for the Static Board The object is created, and afterwards the initMethods are called.
      void checkcircle()
      - Check-box Checks if the circle boolean is true/false and afterwards sends the value to gameBoard
      void clear()
      clear method that clears the specified rectangle, sets color to White and then fills the rectangle with the specified width/height
      void clearButton()
      Clears the board, sets the timeline to stop and draws new clean board.
      void dynamicSize()
      - Check-box Checks if the dynamicsize boolean is true/false and afterwards sends the value to gameboard
      void exitGame()
      Exit the game
      void fileChooser()
      Really simple FileChooser that lets the user loard Run Lenght Encoding Files (RLE)
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources) 
      void initMethods() 
      void Instructions()
      New stage created when the "Instruction" button is called.
      void madeBy()
      Made by
      void MouseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) 
      void MouseDraw(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Draw cells on the board If mouse dragged, sets the cells to alive (1) If controll is down and dragged it will kill alive cells when dragged over (0)
      void nextGen()
      nextGenRule being called to nextGen method After nextGenRule is set, this nextGen method will use it in the code.
      void nextGenRule()
      nextGenRule is a method that sets the game rule from the user input in ComboBox, default rules are the standard Conway Rules
      void oneStep()
      When you click the button it goes only one generation
      void onScroll(javafx.scene.input.ScrollEvent sEvent)
      This method lets the user zoom out The method is not complete as intended.
      void playStop()
      Play/Stop button If the Animation is running the Button is set to Stop If the Animation is not running the Button is set to Play
      void PressKey(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent kevent)
      PressKey is a "onKeyPress" called on the Canvas When you hover over the canvas, you can move the pattern or stop the game by pressing space
      void randomGame()
      Button to generate Random generations
      void sizeSlider()
      Slider listener that controls the cellSize value The listener is called in the initialize so it listens from the start Size slider won't work when the "dynamicSize" is turned off and the user will be informed about that with an alert message
      void speedSlider()
      Slider listener that listens to the slider and controls the timeline speed.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • PressKey

        public void PressKey(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent kevent)
        PressKey is a "onKeyPress" called on the Canvas When you hover over the canvas, you can move the pattern or stop the game by pressing space
        Parameters:
        kevent -

      • clear

        public void clear()
        clear method that clears the specified rectangle, sets color to White and then fills the rectangle with the specified width/height

      • changeStat

        public void changeStat()
        - Radiobutton to Static When Radiobutton static is selected the interface refers to the StaticBoard class When the dynamicBoard is used and changed to Static StaticBoard, it remembers the board converts it to byte and sets the static board This won't delete the pattern and the user can use the same pattern for the Static Board The object is created, and afterwards the initMethods are called. After initMethods, I changed some of the values that i want to be different for the Static StaticBoard.

      • changeDyn

        public void changeDyn()
        - Radiobutton to Dynamic When Radiobutton DynamicBoard is selected the interface refers to the DynamicBoard class After the object is created, the initMethods are called.

      • speedSlider

        public void speedSlider()
        Slider listener that listens to the slider and controls the timeline speed. The listener is called in the initialize so it can start listening from the start of the program

      • sizeSlider

        public void sizeSlider()
        Slider listener that controls the cellSize value The listener is called in the initialize so it listens from the start Size slider won't work when the "dynamicSize" is turned off and the user will be informed about that with an alert message

      • onScroll

        public void onScroll(javafx.scene.input.ScrollEvent sEvent)
        This method lets the user zoom out The method is not complete as intended. TODO: Let the user zoom in and out in a more efficient way

        About the game
